text: 2.18 Apo 2.40, 2 Pi 1.4, 2.20, Jud 16 Kɨli ke suk agɨlɨg takaw yokɨp agɨlɨg, yɨb kɨli ke dad aplanɨbal. Binɨb kɨlop nebneb gɨ dad kɨd kɨli ak amel, kɨli bin si bɨ si gɨ dad amɨl keke tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨpal. Bɨ anɨb okok kɨli anɨgel, binɨb ogɨnap mɨñɨl nep binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok kɨlop kelɨgɨpal okok, kɨlop lɨpɨg dad amek tepayaŋ tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal.
